How to use a URL PARAMETER in an IF STATEMENT??
------------------------------
Does anyone know if this is possible and if so, how would I write the conditional statement that looks for a param set in the URL.  For example....

<http://example.com/page?awesome=yes|example.com/page?awesome=yes>

How would I use the param in and if statement?  I basically am looking for something like this.
```
{% if param == 'yes' %}
You're awesome Dude
{% else %}
You're not so awesome man
{% endif %}```
Any insight is massively appreciated.
BJ is correct! The developer info is a great resource for doing some nice things: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/debugging-and-errors#developer-info>
